description: Returns the issues in the issue tracker.

parameters.description: This can either be the username or the UUID of the account, surrounded by curly-braces, for example: `{account UUID}`. An account is either a team or user.
parameters.name: username

parameters.description: This can either be the repository slug or the UUID of the repository, surrounded by curly-braces, for example: `{repository UUID}`.
parameters.name: repo_slug

200.description: A paginated list of the issues matching any filter criteria that were provided.

404.description: The specified repository does not exist or does not have the issue tracker enabled.
